Summary: Several discs trailing fire, got brighter and progressed south out of sight, also saw Military Plane in location
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking into the southern sky I witnessed several red circles trailing fire in the southern sky. They became brighter and continued to travel south out of sight. What apperaed to be a military jet fighter was beneath them flying north. We were sitting at work and saw out the window. I am not sure what they were, I have never seen anything like this before. I felt confused and amazed by this encounter, and may have changed my skeptism about UFO sightings
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Laurel
There were no other sightings in Laurel on or around October 28th 2010
